1.0.0.name: wordpress/wp-admin-custom-page
1.0.0.description:
The plugin add a custom page in your admin dashboard where you can show html code to editors. You can edit the html text directly in a box place in option page with a WYSIWYG editor. All html, javascript, css are supported. You can also insert Youtube videos or images.

Related Links:

  • Plugin Homepage
  • Author Homepage
